name: Treat Trek
description:
Feed the Trick or Treaters before the clock strikes midnight! 

HOW TO PLAY: 

Use space bar to interact.  When Trick or Treaters ask them what candy they want, and collect the candy from the appropriate cauldron. The quicker you deliver the candy the more points you get, and if you take too long the Trick or Treaters will leave. You can only grab one item at a time, but you can dispose of unwanted items in the empty cauldron.  Use the broom to get rid of spiderwebs. 

ART CREDITS: 

Music: Epic Journey - Royalty Free Zone, Loyalty Freak Music 

Sound effects: DUSTYROOM

Graphics: RAFMANIX, Stevin Baclet

Made for Union College Game Jam.
